GenAiFunction.description:
- Use this Action to read and create Metadata that can be handled by the Tooling API - When in doubt or the action returns an error use the SearchWeb action to find out which API support that type or activity.
Supported Actions: - query: SOQL queries against Tooling API objects - create: Single record creation - update: Modify existing records - delete: Remove development artifacts
Key Object Types: - ApexClass: code, status, body, symbols - CustomField: metadata, relationships, validation - CustomObject: fields, validation rules, layouts - ValidationRule: errorMessage, active, metadata - ApexTrigger: code, status, usageBeforeUpdate - Layout: layout items, buttons, related lists - WorkflowRule: criteria, actions, timeTriggered
